name: Galactic Warriors
description:
It's simple. Your ship, space and bullets. No characters who have deep and complicated story behind them, no mocap sessions but almost professional graphics. Fight through stages which contain different enemies and become the legend. Bear in mind that only one hit makes your mission failed. Upgrade your ship and arsenal to not to give your opponents chance to make it happen. It's easy, right? Prove it now!!!

Release date: 25th March 2018.
